name: The Compass Star
description:
The Compass Star is a bright signal that leads towards a domed city. Maju and Morgan make way towards the star but encounter a larger than life situation that'll put their lives on the line. Can Morgan survive the night?

This game is recommended for ages 13 and up. 

Features:

  • Your choices will determine the outcome of who lives and who dies. 
  • No mob battles; every battle is important and learning the patterns will spell out your victory or your defeat. 
  • Increase your bond with Maju and interact with the villagers of the mysterious town.

Entered into the "Touch the Stars" 2021 RPG Maker Game Jam.

Don't forget to comment & rate the game afterwards! Thank you!

Music & Character Art by Starline Arts
